snippet.title: Hide Time - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
●════════════════════════════●

First look at the upcoming Hide Time game! :)
We are so happy to be able to work on this game!
With the consent of our friends at Shining Star Games we are able to bring Hide Time back, better than ever!
More information about the game coming soon!

●════════════════════════════●

Some information about us! We are a small team of 5 people who have a huge passion for indie games! 
We are quite new to game development but we try our best to make good games!
Thank you in advance for all the support!

●════════════════════════════●

If you want to see our socials go to the pinned comment under this video!

●════════════════════════════●
#HideTime #indiegame #Midnightgames #indiedev #indiedevelopers  #mascothorror #spookygame #horrorgame #gaming #indiehorrorgames 
#spookygames #steamgame #videogames #videogame #mascothorrorgame #storydrivengames #storydrivengame #game #games #gaming #gamers #creep #freegame #horrorstory
